resources.string: If you fall into the following categories, please check the boxes.
I belong to the category of patients with respiratory disorders.

First app version
Created by Riad Pap and Azra Hadžihajdarević as a project for subject Razvoj mobilnih aplikacija.

Application made with Kotlin programming language.

Coronaviruses are a large family of viruses, which we find in humans and animals. Under an electron microscope these viruses, in appearance resemble a crown, lat. "corona", hence the name coronaviruses. Some coronaviruses were found in the 1960s which were the cause of peoples illnesses, from the common cold to severe respiratory diseases. From 2003. new coronaviruses were being discovered, which originated in animals and transferred to humans and started to spread between people. So, after SARS being discovered in China, 2002. and MERS in the Middle East, 2012.(which is still active), new coronavirus originated in China.

New coronavirus is a new type of coronavirus which has not yet been discovered in humans. World Health Organization (WHO) named it SARS-Cov-2 (SARS-coronavirus-2) and the disease which COVID-19 causes (\"coronavirus disease\"). It was discovered in China, late 2019.
How dangerous is the new coronavirus?

With all available information, new coronavirus infection causes symptoms like high temperature, dry cough and tiredness, while in low cases body ache, nose clog and sore throat. One in five people can have difficulty breathing or develop pneumonia, also in low cases even death. Looks like older population and people with chronic diseases ie. heart problems and diabetes, are prone to severe types of the disease. Worth mentioning everyone has a possibility of getting the severe type of COVID-19 infection. Specific number of infected people do not show any symptoms and they belong to asymptomatic group.
Can a person get infected with the new coronavirus trough an animal?

SARS-CoV was transmitted trough Asian palm civet, part of closest animals to cats, while MERS-CoV is transmitted trough camels to people. There are some discovered coronaviruses which circulate among animals, but have not yet been transmitted to people. Animal origin of the new coronavirus has not yet been identified, which does not mean a person can not get infected by any animal or pet. Probable origin of the disease is some animal which was being sold at a market in Wuhan.
Can the new coronavirus transmit from person to person?

Yes, the new coronavirus causes respiratory disease and can transmit from person to person, usually after a close encounter with the infected person, ie. household, at the work place or medical/health institution.
How does the new coronavirus spread?

The new coronavirus is a respiratory virus which primary spreads trough contact with the infected persons saliva particles originating form the mouth or nose while talking, coughing, sneezing and which come in to contact with other persons inside of nose, mouth or eyes. Particles can fall on any neighbouring surface, which in most cases are touched and spread further by people. That is why it is important for everybody to practice respiratory hygiene and keep physical distance from other people at least 2 metres. In close contact it is recommended the use of face masks which cover nose and mouth. Regular and correct hand washing decreases the likelihood of infection..
How long can the new coronavirus survive on a surface?

It is still unknown how long the new coronavirus can survive on a surface. Today\'s understanding of the virus tells us it can survive couple of days on a surface. Usual disinfectants destroy the virus.
How long is the incubation period of the new coronavirus?
It is estimated that the incubation period lasts from 2 to 14 days, on average 5 to 6 days.
Is there a possibility of specific treatment for the disease caused by the new coronavirus?

There is no specific treatment for this disease. Treatment of an infected patient related to the coronavirus is treating clinical symptoms ie. high temperature and providing care. Currently there are vaccines for preventing the spread and infection caused by SARS-COVID-19.
